input_text:
Job Title: Field Service Tech

Location: Ansonia, CT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

A rapidly growing manufacturing company located in the greater New Haven, CT area is currently in search of a well-versed Service Tech. The Service Tech role is responsible for machine installation, startup training, repair, remote assistance, and maintenance. High Travel Role. Excellent benefits Hourly up to $34 + OT and Travel Bonuses

location: Ansonia, Connecticut

job type: Permanent

salary: $60,000 - 70,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: High School

Responsibilities

 Install new equipment at customer facility and ensure integration Responsible for the direction of customer-furnished personnel in the assembly, trial operation, or repair of equipment, in both domestic and foreign locations. Direct, instruct, and advise customer personnel as to methods, schedules, safety practices or other matters affecting assembly, operation, and servicing of equipment. Installing and testing products, equipment, and machinery and providing instructions to customers on the proper usage of their product. Servicing heavy equipment, such as farm or factory machines, diesel engines, and computer networks

The Essential Functions Of This Role Include

wearing steel toe shoesworking up to 2 hrs of overtime per week

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 4 years of experienceEducation: High School

skills: 

PLCControlsField ServiceField ServiceField Service

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
